pageContext.claim: “Premiums are so high that 6.5 million Americans chose to pay a fine to the IRS instead of buying insurance, the famous mandate.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has adjusted a talking point here, as he used to claim the figure was nearly 20 million. But he's still incorrect that people are paying this penalty because of increasing premiums. The number of people choosing to pay a penalty dropped from 8 million to 6.5 million from 2014 to 2015, even though premiums increased.
